scripts.build-documentSDK-net9: gulp static-assets && gulp server-build --option server-net9 && gulp wasm-build --option wasm-net9
scripts.build-documentSDK-net8: gulp server-build --option server-net8 && gulp wasm-build --option wasm-net8
scripts.publish-documentSDK-net8: gulp publish --option server-net8 && gulp publish --option wasm-net8
scripts.publish-documentSDK-net9: gulp publish --option server-net9 && gulp publish --option wasm-net9
scripts.run-accessibility: npm run sample-build && npm run accessibility && gulp axecore-overall-report
